name: XP267 Ex02 - Custom Metrics into Cloud ALM

serviceKey.description: Used to authenticate and push metrics to SAP Cloud ALM API

input.url: $(.getCfSpace.output.body | toObject | .links.quota.href | if . == null then ($.getCfOrg.output.body | toObject | .links.quota.href) else . end)

input.message: $(.getCfSpaceQuota.output.body | toObject | .apps.total_memory_in_mb | if . == null then "0" else ((($.calculateSpaceMemory.output.spaceMemory | toNumber) / ($.getCfSpaceQuota.output.body | toObject | .apps.total_memory_in_mb | toNumber)) * 10000 | round | . / 100 | if . == null then 0 else . end) end)

$(.getCfOrgQuota.output.body | toObject | .apps.total_memory_in_mb | if . == null or . == 0 then 0 else (($.getCfOrgUsage.output.body | toObject | .usage_summary.memory_in_mb | toNumber) / ($.getCfOrgQuota.output.body | toObject | .apps.total_memory_in_mb | toNumber) * 10000 | round | . / 100 ) end)

commands.name: CheckResourceQuotaUtilizationXP267
commands.description: Calculate resource utilization of Cloud Foundry space and its parrent organization

spaceId.description: The GUID identifier of the Cloud Foundry space

region.description: Technical name of your SAP BTP region, e.g. cf-eu10,cf-eu20

user.description: User ID or email of a Cloud Foundry technical user

identityProvider.description: Identity provider to be used  By default it is SAP ID Service (sap.ids). To use a custom IdP, enter origin key from the CF Org/Space members section.

input.url: $(.getCfSpace.output.body | toObject | .links.quota.href | if . == null then ($.getCfOrg.output.body | toObject | .links.quota.href) else . end)

input.message: $(.getCfSpaceQuota.output.body | toObject | .apps.total_memory_in_mb | if . == null then "0" else ((($.calculateSpaceMemory.output.spaceMemory | toNumber) / ($.getCfSpaceQuota.output.body | toObject | .apps.total_memory_in_mb | toNumber)) * 10000 | round | . / 100 | if . == null then 0 else . end) end)

$(.getCfOrgQuota.output.body | toObject | .apps.total_memory_in_mb | if . == null or . == 0 then 0 else (($.getCfOrgUsage.output.body | toObject | .usage_summary.memory_in_mb | toNumber) / ($.getCfOrgQuota.output.body | toObject | .apps.total_memory_in_mb | toNumber) * 10000 | round | . / 100 ) end)

commands.name: CheckResourceQuotaUtilizationXP267Extended
commands.description: Calculate resource utilization of Cloud Foundry space and its parrent organization

spaceId.description: The GUID identifier of the Cloud Foundry space

region.description: Technical name of your SAP BTP region, e.g. cf-eu10,cf-eu20

user.description: User ID or email of a Cloud Foundry technical user

identityProvider.description: Identity provider to be used  By default it is SAP ID Service (sap.ids). To use a custom IdP, enter origin key from the CF Org/Space members section.

output.spaceMemory: $(.calculateAppMemory.output.outputs | map({desiredState: .desiredState, name: .desiredStateData.name, memory: .memory, instances: .stateData.instances}) | [.[] | {desiredState,name, memory, instances} | select(.desiredState != "STOPPED")] | map(.memory * .instances) | add)

defaultCfCredentials.description: Credentials need to authenticate against Cloud Foundry

appResources.description: Aplications data in the Cloud Foundry space

spaceMemory.description: Total memory used by all started applications in the Cloud Foundry space

commands.name: PushCloudAlmGaugeXP267
commands.description: Sends a gauge metric to Cloud ALM Health Monitoring

unit.description: Metric unit to push, e.g., mb, bytes, millis

devMode.description: When true, the consumer is called synchronously so you immediately get the response and error messages. Intended only for implementation and testing

serviceKey.description: Credential to authenticate and send metrics to Cloud ALM

serviceId.description: Unique identifier of the service as defined in Cloud ALM

response.description: The response from Cloud ALM when the metric is sent in devMode

commands.name: PushCloudAlmQuotaXP267
commands.description: Sends a quota metric to track resource utilization against predefined limits in Cloud ALM Health Monitoring

unit.description: Metric unit to push, e.g., mb, bytes

devMode.description: When true, the consumer is called synchronously so you immediately get the response and error messages. Intended only for implementation and testing

serviceKey.description: Credential to authenticate and send metrics to Cloud ALM

serviceId.description: Unique identifier of the service as defined in Cloud ALM

response.description: The response from Cloud ALM when the metric is sent in devMode

commands.name: PushCloudAlmStatusXP267
commands.description: Sends a simple health status to Cloud ALM Health Monitoring

devMode.description: When true, the consumer is called synchronously so you immediately get the response and error messages. Intended only for implementation and testing

attributes.description: Used to describe the measurement itself - what exactly was measured. Example: { "route": "/health" }

serviceKey.description: Credential to authenticate and send metrics to Cloud ALM

message.description: Human-readable message of the current state/context

serviceId.description: Unique identifier of the service as defined in Cloud ALM

resourceAttributes.description: Describe the entity producing the metrics and apply to every metric in that resource block. Example: { "service.name": "my-app" }

response.description: The response from Cloud ALM when the metric is sent in devMode
